title: Designing Informal Language Education Using Transmedia Storytelling

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Storytelling-based learning utilizing diverse media platforms in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can create short stories by combining at least three media formats (text, image, audio).
Learners can explain the principles of transmedia (content interlinking across digital platforms).
Learners can collaboratively produce media content with peer learners using collaboration tools.

resources: Free Digital Creation Tools (Canva, Audacity, etc.)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
